titleStmt.title: An elegie on the death of the Right Honourable Iohn Warner, late Lord Mayor of London.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Jeremiah, d. 1660?

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Ieremiah Rich. Fecit.
Verse - "The sweetest, fairest, and the best of flowers,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
